title: Saki-Chan Is a Succubusâ€™s Child
description:
'Sexy is ok?!' got a lot of appreciation on SNS! The long-awaited first volume is here!

Succubus Saki-chan falls in love with, out of everyone, a monk's son, Rokuhara. Even though she tries her best to talk to him, her succubus blood starts rushing and unintentionally makes the situation rather... tempting.
'It wish I could just tell him that I like him, normally!'
Where is this devilishly cute succubus's naughty headed to...?!

A full power love comedy about a pitiful succubus and a straight laced monk boy!
author: Hotomura
